titleStmt.title: A letter of advice to the churches of the non-conformists in the English nation endeavouring their satisfaction in that point, who are the true Church of England?
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Cotton Mather. cf. NUC pre-1956.
